name: thedailybeast
text: Describing the U.S. president as “our candidate Trump,” “our friend Donald,” “our Grandpa” and “poor, poor Trump,” Kremlin-controlled media conceded that his days in the Oval Office are numbered. They also celebrated the bright side of his four-year reign. https://t.co/dmVfKod6kq

text: EXCLUSIVE: President Trump is weighing granting clemency to Ross Ulbricht, the founder and former administrator of the world’s most famous darknet drug market, Silk Road, The Daily Beast has learned https://t.co/HOSChZVxLJ

text: "The message seems to be that being twice as good is no longer enough," writes @keligoff. "[Black Americans] must be twice as good, and choose the right professional path, which may arbitrarily change with the whims of progressives." https://t.co/dNj3Cok2cJ
